com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.business.service

Interface GameHubGameActionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameHubGameActionServiceImpl

    public GameHubGameActionService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(HubGame game, int ticks)
      Handles the game actions per tick. ticks parameter shows the amount of ticks 0 - 20 for each second.
      <P> boolean joinGame(HubGame game, P player, Team team)
      Lets the given player leave join the given game. Optional can the prefered team be specified but the team can still change because of arena settings. Does nothing if the player is already in a Game.
      <P> void leaveGame(HubGame game, P player)
      Lets the given player leave the given game. Does nothing if the player is not in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • joinGame

        <P> boolean joinGame(HubGame game,
                     P player,
                     Team team)

        Lets the given player leave join the given game. Optional can the prefered team be specified but the team can still change because of arena settings. Does nothing if the player is already in a Game.

      • leaveGame

        <P> void leaveGame(HubGame game,
                   P player)

        Lets the given player leave the given game. Does nothing if the player is not in the game.

      • handle

        void handle(HubGame game,
            int ticks)

        Handles the game actions per tick. ticks parameter shows the amount of ticks 0 - 20 for each second.
